subject: Golf
Masters Golf Tournament
lead_paragraph: Mark Foster shot a six-under-par 66 in a strong, swirling wind to share the lead with Robert-Jan Derksen after two rounds of the British Masters in Sutton Coldfield, England. Both players were at seven-under 137, leading a group of five players by one stroke. Derksen shot a 68.
